title: Protest forces passengers to walk miles to BIA
body_lines: Departing passengers are forced to walk miles to the Bandaranaike Airport as anti-government protests today blocked the connecting road from the Expressway is completely blocked at Averiwatte junction.
Many tourists were inconvenienced as a result whilst threatening mis-connections to those who had shorter time to do pre-boardimg formalities.
Officials at BIA said normal operations continued despite countrywide token strike against the Government by trade unions.
